job_details.Vacaturetitel: Staff/Sr Machine Learning Engineer - Applied AI
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The Applied AI team collaborates with product teams across Uber to deliver innovative AI solutions for core business problems. We work closely with engineering, product and data science teams to understand core business problems and the potential for AI solutions, then deliver those AI solutions end-to-end. Key areas of expertise include Computer Vision, ML Optimization, Geospatial AI, Personalization and Generative AI.

   The ML Optimization team within Applied AI is building new experiences to surface earnings opportunities on the Uber platform, particularly for new earners. We are looking for a strong Machine Learning Engineer to join our team in Amsterdam!

   ABOUT THE ROLE

   Our team engages with partners across teams to design, develop and productionize machine learning systems for highly complex and vaguely defined problems.

   WHAT YOU'LL DO
     * Collaborate with product teams to analyze key business problems and develop innovative ML solutions.
     * Collaborate with data science and engineering teams to integrate and validate ML solutions end-to-end.
     * Deliver enduring value in the form of software and model artifacts.
job_details.full_text:
Staff/Sr Machine Learning Engineer - Applied AI

The Applied AI team collaborates with product teams across Uber to deliver innovative AI solutions for core business problems. We work closely with engineering, product and data science teams to understand core business problems and the potential for AI solutions, then deliver those AI solutions end-to-end. Key areas of expertise include Computer Vision, ML Optimization, Geospatial AI, Personalization and Generative AI.

   The ML Optimization team within Applied AI is building new experiences to surface earnings opportunities on the Uber platform, particularly for new earners. We are looking for a strong Machine Learning Engineer to join our team in Amsterdam!

   ABOUT THE ROLE

   Our team engages with partners across teams to design, develop and productionize machine learning systems for highly complex and vaguely defined problems.

   WHAT YOU'LL DO
     * Collaborate with product teams to analyze key business problems and develop innovative ML solutions.
     * Collaborate with data science and engineering teams to integrate and validate ML solutions end-to-end.
     * Deliver enduring value in the form of software and model artifacts.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and productionizing machine learning systems for core business problems, with a focus on ML optimization and integrating ML solutions end-to-end. While Generative AI is mentioned as an area of expertise for the broader team, the specific role's core responsibilities and tasks align more closely with the definition and evidence profile of an ML Engineer, particularly in algorithm development, data preprocessing, model training, and productionizing prototypes.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'collaborate with product teams to analyze key business problems' directly indicates understanding business context and translating needs into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product teams to analyze key business problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop innovative ML solutions' and 'develop and productionize machine learning systems' points to the core activity of creating and implementing ML models.
The phrase 'develop and productionize machine learning systems' indicates the creation and deployment of models.
job_tasks.phrase: develop and productionize machine learning systems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Deliver enduring value in the form of software and model artifacts' implies the creation of software components as part of the solution.
job_tasks.phrase: Deliver enduring value in the form of software and model artifacts

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrate and validate ML solutions end-to-end' suggests the software engineering aspect of bringing ML solutions into a larger system.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate and validate ML solutions end-to-end

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'productionize machine learning systems' directly relates to deploying and maintaining models in a production environment.
The phrase 'understand core business problems and the potential for AI solutions' shows an ability to grasp business needs and identify AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: understand core business problems and the potential for AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deliver those AI solutions end-to-end' implies the full lifecycle of model development and deployment.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with data science and engineering teams
design, develop and productionize machine learning systems for highly complex and vaguely defined problems
